name: Mac Half Round Frameless Dump Trailer
name_original: Mac Half Round Frameless Dump Trailer
description:
Custom built Mac Half Round with more features than you can throw a stick at! Custom flexible mud flaps that also fold on dump. Flexible hoses, connection hoses with wet line hook up. Probably the nicest 24.5" Alcoa rims to ever hit farm sim. Custom 3d modeled dynamically loaded lights. Options to dump out the tailgate or through the coal chute. Store options include light options, tailgate decal, and a standard tub, or a tub with poly liner. The more you study the details on this trailer the more you will find there was no love left out!

Enjoy! There are two download links. 

One is for the trailer. 

The other includes a custom wet line adapter to add to your trucks connection hoses. I am not going into detail on how to add it and make it function if you do not know, plenty of tutorials on YouTube that will cover this! 

Once again thank you for all the support!
